You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE
Configure Product Info and Options on the Product Compare Page

Provide as much or as little detail that your buyers expect when they're comparing products. You can specify how much information and which options are available for each product listed on the Product Compare page.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS

Salesforce Compatibility

Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.




B2B Commerce Compatibility

B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9)


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To access CC Admin and change settings:	Access B2B Commerce for Visualforce Admin Settings permission set

You can configure the following details and options:

Each product's SKU (1).
Each product's short description (2).
An Additional Info link (3) that opens a window with more product information.
Each product's unit of measure (4).
Each product's price information (5). You can optionally show the list price (6) and the buyer's savings (7) based on their specific entitled price. List price depends on the product's price in the storefront's base price list.
A message that can appear when each product's available inventory is zero (8).
Controls for adding a specific quantity of each product to a wish list (if enabled) or cart (9). If you've defined any product quantity rules, quantity increment controls are available. You can also specify what happens when the buyer clicks Add to Cart: either stay on the current page, or immediately navigate to the Shopping Cart page.

You can also specify whether the SKU (10) and short description (11) appear in the window that opens from the Additional Info link (3):

To configure the Product Compare page information and options, update your storefront configuration settings.

On the CC Admin tab in your org, select your storefront (1).
In the Storefront Settings menu, select Configuration Settings (2).
From the Module picklist, select Product Compare (3).
Specify what product information you want to show.
Find the following configurations, and find their values:
Show SKU Product Info (4, 5)
Show Short Description (6, 7)
Show Unit of Measure (8, 9)
Show Availability (10, 11)
Show Price (12, 13)
If the information you want to show is TRUE, skip this step.
If the information you want to show is FALSE or doesn't exist, continue to the next step.
Click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Product Compare
Configuration	
Show SKU Product Info
Show Short Description
Show Unit of Measure
Show Availability
Show Price

Page	PCP
Value	TRUE
If you enabled Show Price, specify which pricing information you want to include.
Find the following configurations, and find their values:
Show List Price (14, 15)
Show Savings (16, 17)
If the pricing information you want to include is TRUE, skip this step.
If the pricing information you want to include is FALSE or doesn't exist, continue to the next step.
Click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Product Compare
Configuration	
Show List Price
Show Savings

Page	PCP
Value	TRUE
Specify which information you want to show in the Additional Info window.
Find the following configurations, and find their values:
Show Additional Info (18, 19)
Show the Additional Info link, which opens the Additional Info window.
Additional Info SKU (20, 21)
Show the product SKU in the Additional Info window.
Additional Info Short Description (22, 23)
Show the product short description in the Additional Info window.
If the Additional Info content you want to include is TRUE, skip this step.
If the Additional Info content you want to include is FALSE or doesn't exist, continue to the next step.
Click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Product Compare
Configuration	
Show Additional Info
Additional Info SKU
Additional Info Short Description

Page	PCP
Value	TRUE
Specify the behavior you want for the Add to Cart button.
Find the following configurations, and find their values:
Show Add To Cart (24, 25)
Show the quantity field, Add to Wish List button, and Add to Cart button.
Go To Cart (26, 27)
Navigate to the Shopping Cart page immediately after the Add to Cart button is clicked. When this configuration is FALSE, the buyer remains on the Product Compare page after clicking the Add to Cart button.
If the Add to Cart behavior you want to include is TRUE, skip this step.
If you want to change the current Add to Cart behavior, or if the appropriate configuration doesn't exist, continue to the next step.
Click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Product Compare
Configuration	
Show Add To Cart
Go To Cart

Page	PCP
Value	TRUE or FALSE
Build and activate a new configuration cache.

title: Configure Product Compare Page in B2B Commerce
